title: Has our Indian economy started to reopen? - Quora
tags: Economics of Everyday Life in India

response.answer_text: For now we can say that wait and watch. Because it is all dependent upon us that how we work and how our government supports us. government has declared the package for us and will help us so it is our duty also that we make our economy strong by using and making Indian products. And boycotting Chinese products more. and also we have to export more into foreign countries and import less from outside of nation. Jay Hind. Vande Mataram. upvote for more reach of answer and follow for more informative Knowledge.
